amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $45 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $45 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 246 (Roll no. 201).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
